title: Dinenrbone：启动器已初步加入自定义配置系统
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
Nathan Adams ‏@Dinnerbone

今天将试着给启动器加入自定义配置系统：还记得之前说过的自定义游戏版本，自定义内存等功能吗？
Hopefully a new launcher update will be pushed out later today with some profile support. Remembering your version, custom memory, etc.

Nathan Adams ‏@Dinnerbone

基本的自定义配置系统已经推出。现在还没有这个系统的GUI界面，所有的功能还都隐藏在你的硬盘中。
Okay, basic launcher profile system pushed out. There's no visible GUI for it though, all behind the scenes and on disk. Woo hidden work!
